Class Player

java.lang.Object
  Player

public class Player
extends java.lang.Object

A player in the game, Lyle. A player has a currentRoom, the room it's in; a maxWeight, the int amount of weight it can carry; and an ArrayList of items.

Version:
(04-26-2010)
Author:
(Logan Lowder)

Method Detail

canCarryItem

public boolean canCarryItem(Item item)
Checks whether or not the new item-to-add's weight plus the current weight the player is carrying is over the player's max carrying weight.

Parameters:
item - The item to weigh.
Returns:
Returns true if the player can carry this item, false if the player cannot.

dropItem

public void dropItem(Item item)
Drops a certain item from the players bag.

Parameters:
item - The item to drop.

getCurrentRoom

public Room getCurrentRoom()
Returns what room the player is currently in... duh.

Returns:
The room the player is in.

getItem

public Item getItem(java.lang.String itemName)
Gets an item from the player.

Parameters:
itemName - A String that should match the name of the item.
Returns:
Returns an item if itemName matches the name of an item the player has. Otherwise returns null.

getPlayerItems

public java.util.ArrayList getPlayerItems()
Returns an ArrayList of all the items the player is carrying.

Returns:
The player's playerItems ArrayList.

hasItem

public boolean hasItem(java.lang.String name)
Checks whether the player has a certain item.

Parameters:
name - A name of type String that should match the name of the item to check for.
Returns:
Returns true if the player has this item, false otherwise.

pickUpItem

public void pickUpItem(Item item)
Adds an item to the player's list of items.

Parameters:
item - The item to add to the player's bag.

setCurrentRoom

public void setCurrentRoom(Room newRoom)
Sets a new room for the player to be in.

Parameters:
newRoom - The new room you want the player to be in.

setMaxWeight

public void setMaxWeight(int newMaxWeight)
Sets a new max carrying weight for the player.

Parameters:
newMaxWeight - The new max carrying weight.
